title: Listener Mail: Saturday, October 29
description: 10 days to go. This episode was recorded Friday, just before news broke of newly discovered emails by the FBI that may relate to their investigation of Hillary Clinton's personal email server. More on that story in our episode from Friday, October 28. This episode: host/congressional correspondent Susan Davis, political reporter Danielle Kurtzleben, White House correspondent Scott Horsley, and editor/correspondent Ron Elving. More coverage at nprpolitics.org. Email the show at nprpolitics@npr.org.
